title: Rechargeable Torches LED Super Bright 500000 Lumens, Powerful USB C LED Torch Light with Mini UV 365nm Touch, High Power Tactical Flashlight, Strong Hand Flash Light for Security Dog Walking Camping
features: [2025 UPGRADED HIGH BRIGHTNESS & LONG RANGE ] The ESGREEN ED0330 rechargeable torch LED super bright is made of a upgraded PH-L330 30W LED which has a feature of high brightness and ultra long beam. The powerful torch rechargeable provides a max output of 500000 lumens, it can easily illuminate the whole room and backyard. The ultra strong beam provides high concentration circle beam, so it can easily and clearly focus on objects up to 3280 feet away. It is ideal for camping, hiking, dog walking

[NEWEST LUMINOUS DESIGN & IMPROVED LCD DIGITAL POWER DISPLAY] Different with others, the high power flashlight torch rechargeable is inset 6pcs of luminous strip on the head, it can light up with different colors in dark, with compact handheld size, it looks beautiful and quite cool. It is equipped with a LCD power display that shows remaining battery power exactly, so that you will get known when to charge it in advance. It is the ideal gift for a father, husband, wife or student.

[MULTIFUNCTIONAL 2 IN 1 - FAST USB C CHARGING & POWER BANK FUNCTION] The handheld strong torch led super bright rechargeable is built-in 2 USB interfaces, one is USB C input for charging, the other is USB output which can be used as a power bank. It can charge your smartphone, earphone or any other USB devices, it is convenient to get charged in indoor or outdoor activities.

[LONG LASTING & OVERCHARGE PROTECTION] The most powerful USB C flash light torch rechargeable is equipped with 1pcs 6000mAh rechargeable battery, so it can provided up to 15 hours of powerful and non-diminishing brightness. Both the battery and tourch are built-in a smart chip that has the function of overcharging protection to ensure safety.

[BRIGHTNESS & FOCUS ADJUSTABLE] According to your needs and the environment, you can adjust the brightness and focus. Press the button to switch light modes, long press for 3s to turn off directly at any mode. There are 5 modes: high-middle-low-strobe-SOS. The SOS and strobe mode are usually used for emergency situations such as car breakdown or get lost at night. Push or pull the head to adjust the focus, it can create brilliant large-area floodlight or perfectly spotlight.

[PRACTICALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE & IPX7 WATERPROOF] The body of the ultra bright torch rechargeable is made of super hard aviation-grade aluminum alloy, impact resistance, wear-resistant and drop-resistant. It is strong enough to withstand a 10 feet accident drop and even ran over by a truck, it still works! IPX7 waterproof torch has a built-in high tenacity seal rubber waterproof ring, so there is no any problem to be used in any bad weather, such as rain or snow.

[PACKING LIST & EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE] You will get 1x high lumen torch,1x 365nm UV mini rechargeable torch, 1x 6000mAh rechargeable battery, 3x AAA Alkaline batteries,1x USB C cable, 1x holster. We are providing high quality products and the best customer service as our aims. You will be pleasantly surprised by the brightness, quality, longevity and performance of the most powerful torch. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will be happy to answer your questions.
